attributes.action: Allow a referendum on legalising Assisted Dying.
attributes.additional_details: This is a highly sensitive topic and one where everyone will have an individual opinion. I feel that the best way to move forward with this is to allow the public to have their say one way or another. It is a too sensitive of a topic for MPs to decide on themselves and I feel it should be opened up to the public to decide.
attributes.background: Allow the British public to have their say on legalising assisted dying.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701838
